meanings.definition: A person who keeps a diary.
meanings.sent1: Many diarists enjoy writing about their daily experiences.
meanings.sent2: The library has a section dedicated to famous diarists throughout history.
meanings.sent3: The group of diarists at the workshop shared funny stories from their journals.
meanings.sent4: She was a diarist, capturing her thoughts like a painter with a brush.
meanings.sent5: The diarists in the class were as numerous as stars in the night sky.

meanings.definition: The act of keeping a diary.
meanings.sent1: The diarists of the family wrote down their memories for future generations.
meanings.sent2: Journaling has become a popular activity, with many people embracing their inner diarists.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the best diarist of the year was fierce and filled with drama.
meanings.sent4: Her diary was a treasure trove of emotions, a true reflection of her life as a diarist.
meanings.sent5: The art of being a diarist requires dedication and a love for storytelling.
